messages.text: Just got some new cables today.
I am loving the bluebird. Really clear sound.
Not sure if the MOTU is working out. I may switch to a Scarlett device soon. We'll see.
Never give freebies again, l337 are two months late with the check.
Good session with Dead Doors Down depends on drummer sobriety
Johanna has a great voice but the first two takes are always the best, make sure not to squander these.
